text: A Very Christmas Story () is a 2000 Polish comedy movie directed by Dariusz Zawislak and starring Paul Burczyk, Kasia Olarz, Bartosz Opania, Jan Englert, Gustaw Holoubek, Jerzy Łapiński. ==Other websites== * Category:2000 comedy movies Category:Polish comedy movies Category:Christmas movies
title: A Very Christmas Story
